subject: Missing Cactus property
msgSnippet: Hi, i have written a testcase for login action classwith strutstestcase.I have taken necessary jar  into the WSAD 5.1 java build path and cactus.properties in
messageBody:
Hi,

i have written a testcase for login action classwith strutstestcase.I have taken necessary jar into the WSAD 5.1 java build path and cactus.properties in the WEB-INF.I am getting this error
error!!!
org.apache.cactus.util.ChainedRuntimeException: Missing Cactus property [cactus.contextURL]
at org.apache.cactus.internal.configuration.BaseConfiguration.getContextURL(BaseConfiguration.java:59)
at org.apache.cactus.internal.configuration.AbstractWebConfiguration.getRedirectorURL_aroundBody0(AbstractWebConfiguration.java:46)
at org.apache.cactus.internal.configuration.AbstractWebConfiguration.getRedirectorURL_aroundBody1$advice(AbstractWebConfiguration.java:288)
at org.apache.cactus.internal.configuration.AbstractWebConfiguration.getRedirectorURL(AbstractWebConfiguration.java)
at org.apache.cactus.internal.client.connector.http.DefaultHttpClient.callRunTest(DefaultHttpClient.java:159)
at org.apache.cactus.internal.client.connector.http.DefaultHttpClient.doTest_aroundBody0(DefaultHttpClient.java:80)
at org.apache.cactus.internal.client.connector.http.DefaultHttpClient.doTest_aroundBody1$advice(DefaultHttpClient.java:288)
at org.apache.cactus.internal.client.connector.http.DefaultHttpClient.doTest(DefaultHttpClient.java)
at org.apache.cactus.internal.client.connector.http.HttpProtocolHandler.runWebTest(HttpProtocolHandler.java:159)
at org.apache.cactus.internal.client.connector.http.HttpProtocolHandler.runTest_aroundBody0(HttpProtocolHandler.java:80)
at org.apache.cactus.internal.client.connector.http.HttpProtocolHandler.runTest_aroundBody1$advice(HttpProtocolHandler.java:288)
at org.apache.cactus.internal.client.connector.http.HttpProtocolHandler.runTest(HttpProtocolHandler.java)
at org.apache.cactus.internal.client.ClientTestCaseCaller.runTest(ClientTestCaseCaller.java:144)
at org.apache.cactus.internal.AbstractCactusTestCase.runBareClient(AbstractCactusTestCase.java:215)
at org.apache.cactus.internal.AbstractCactusTestCase.runBare(AbstractCactusTestCase.java:133)
at junit.framework.TestResult$1.protect(TestResult.java:106)
at junit.framework.TestResult.runProtected(TestResult.java:124)
at junit.framework.TestResult.run(TestResult.java:109)
at junit.framework.TestCase.run(TestCase.java:118)
at junit.framework.TestSuite.runTest(TestSuite.java:208)
at junit.framework.TestSuite.run(TestSuite.java:203)
at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.junit.runner.RemoteTestRunner.runTests(RemoteTestRunner.java:329)
at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.junit.runner.RemoteTestRunner.run(RemoteTestRunner.java:218)
at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.junit.runner.RemoteTestRunner.main(RemoteTestRunner.java:151)


This the action class.

package com.lms.actions.*;

import java.io.IOException;
import java.sql.Connection;
import java.sql.SQLException;
import java.sql.Statement;
import javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest;
import javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse;
import javax.servlet.http.HttpSession;
import net.sf.hibernate.Session;
import net.sf.hibernate.SessionFactory;
import net.sf.hibernate.*;
import net.sf.hibernate.HibernateException;
import net.sf.hibernate.MappingException;
import net.sf.hibernate.cfg.Configuration;
import org.apache.struts.action.Action;
import org.apache.struts.action.ActionForm;
import org.apache.struts.action.ActionForward;
import org.apache.struts.action.ActionMapping;
import com.smartbridge.lmsweb.DAOs.LoginDAO;
import com.smartbridge.lmsweb.helpers.HibernateUtil;

public class LoginActionClass extends Action {
String login;
String password;
boolean isValidUser = false;
SessionFactory sessionFactory = null;
HttpSession Httpsession;
Connection con;
Session dataSession;
Statement st;
String utype = null;
boolean flag = false;
public LoginActionClass() throws IOException {

}
public ActionForward execute(
ActionMapping mapping,
ActionForm form,
HttpServletRequest request,
HttpServletResponse response)
throws SQLException, IOException, HibernateException {
Httpsession = request.getSession(true);
dataSession = HibernateUtil.getSession();
login = request.getParameter("login");
password = request.getParameter("password");

String LoginQuery =
"select * from UserLogin where Login like '"
+ login
+ "' and PassWord='"
+ password
+ "' and Active=1" ;
if ((login == null || login.length() == 0)
|| (password == null || password.length() == 0)) {
request.setAttribute("failureMsg", "Enter your Login id/Password");
return mapping.findForward("Failure");
} else {
Httpsession.setAttribute("sessLoginid",login);
Httpsession.setAttribute("sessPassword",password);
LoginDAO ldao = new LoginDAO(Httpsession, dataSession);
flag = ldao.validateUser(login, password, LoginQuery, request,Httpsession);
if (flag == false)
request.setAttribute("failureMsg", "Invalid Credentials");
}

HibernateUtil.closeSession();
if (flag)
return mapping.findForward("Success");
else
return mapping.findForward("Failure");
}
}


This the Testcase

package com.strutstestcase;

import junit.framework.TestCase;
import com.lmsweb.actions.*;
import servletunit.struts.CactusStrutsTestCase;

public class LoginActionClassTest extends CactusStrutsTestCase {
/**
* Constructor for LoginActionClassTest.
* @param arg0
*/
public LoginActionClassTest(String arg0) {
super(arg0);
}
public static void main(String[] args) {
junit.textui.TestRunner.run(LoginActionClassTest.class);
}
public void testLogin() {
setRequestPathInfo("/Login");
addRequestParameter("login","deryl");
addRequestParameter("password","radar");
actionPerform();
verifyForward("success");
}

}
